String.string: The cave begins trembling.
The cave begins trembling violently.
Change to Abomitwin Tension at 40% Abomination HP
Thalweg prepares to devour demokrons.
The demokrons approach.
Monsters are approaching.
Monsters are approaching.
Immunity to melee attacks in 5 seconds
Immunity to range attacks in 5 seconds
The tentacles recover HP.
The battle has weakened the building.
Thalweg summons demokrons.
Thalweg becomes more powerful with demokrons close by.
The demokrons approach.
Thalweg recovers HP with demokrons close by.
Demokrons swarm in from behind.
Demokrons are climbing up the bridge from below.
Krakatox approaches.
The cave is collapsing.
Watch out! Falling rocks will briefly stun you.
Krakatox summons tentacles to ensnare you!
The entrance will close in 10 seconds.
The entrance will close in 20 seconds.
Thalweg is in danger.
All the demokrons flock to Thalweg.
Thalweg howls, calling the demokrons to him.
Krakatox gathers energy.
Stop Krakatox before he finishes gathering the energy.
The cave is collapsing.
The power of the demokron's curse fills the cave.
Krakatox is becoming enraged.
He grows stronger with time.
Thalweg summons Demokrons.
When the summoned Demokrons move to Thalweg, his attack power increases.
Krakatox can create more bombs now.
The demokron energy will kill you 10 minutes from the beginning of the battle.
